Text.Page:
Noruks are normally docile enough, but damned if they don't get skittish at the slightest magical twinge.

I need you to kill several {@LinkCreature:13#300921#noruks} and bring samples of their fur up to Neziir at the Northern Overwatch.

Think you can manage? Noruks are a little tougher than ghilliedhus.
Watch out for the noruk's charge attack. It's deadly!
